categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope actors

nodes.text: Don Henderson (November 10, 1931–June 22, 1997) was an English actor who portrayed General Cassio Tagge in Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope.

He is also known to sci-fi fans for appearing in Doctor Who as the villain Gavrok in the story Delta and the Bannermen (1987) and in Red Dwarf VII as a Simulant in Beyond a Joke (1997), his final role before his death.
